rules.title: Super Selection
rules.description: selecting chars under the cursor with super

manipulators.description: super+space -> cmd+d (select next instance of selected)
super+p -> cmd+d (select next instance of selected)
super+; -> cmd+o (skip selection of next instance of selected)
super+f -> cmd+u (undo selection of next instance of selected)

rules.title: Hyper Shift
rules.description: hyper should behave like shift (most of the time)

rules.title: Hyper Command
rules.description: sometimes, hyper should also behave like command

rules.title: Hyper Normal
rules.description: hyper should not modify these keys' behaviour

manipulators.description: hyper+cmd+backspace -> cmd+backspace (delete until beginning of line)
hyper+backspace -> delete_forward (delete one char in front)
hyper+delete_forward -> option+delete_forward (delete one word in front)
hyper+option+delete_forward -> cmd+delete_forward (delete till end of line)
